summary:
As Partner People & Organisation at PwC Bastiaan is responsible for Modern HR covering multiple Digital HR solutions and services. Bastiaan is overseeing client services for multiple HR cloud solutions like Oracle HCM and SuccessFactors, as well as Engagement Layer technologies and Payroll.

Bastiaan has over 19 years of international experience in HR transformation, HR and Payroll Services outsourcing and HCM Cloud Technology consulting including Service Line Leadership. From a content perspective his experience covers client services and program leadership in the areas of Human Resources and Payroll Service Delivery Models, Employee Experience,  Change Management, Outsourcing, Offshoring and Technology implementations.

Bastiaan has experience in managing complex international implementation projects and outsourcing programs, and has performed a variety of roles from Expert & Management Consulting to Program Management. He is a client services leader with extensive experience in managing (global) teams.

education.field_of_study: Master of Business Administration; Policy, Communication & Organization

profile_positions.description:
After 7 years at Deloitte it is time for a change. The past 7 years have been a great experience for me.  Looking back at the opportunity to work with an amazing HCM Cloud team as we launched and grew a successful Digital HR Solutions practice in the Netherlands, I realize that this is for sure one of my key accomplishments in my career so far.

A big thanks to all the great colleagues at Deloitte for making this chapter such a nice experience! And specific to the Digital HR solutions team, it has been a pleasure working with you through these years. I wish everyone all the best and hope to keep in touch!

Stay tuned for my next step after I have finished my sabbatical.
profile_positions.title: On sabbatical

In 2008 Bastiaan became Global Account Director for one of NGA Human Resources’ bigger global clients and since then has been performing this role for multiple global clients within Europe, Asia Pacific and North America.

His profile is a composite of strong analytical, functional, commercial and managerial skills.
